about_the_game: Ride a wave of nostalgia into the heart of the Milwaukee punk scene with 'Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos'. In this arcade-style game reminiscent of the '80s and '90s, you'll journey with the band to iconic local venues like Last Rites, Cactus Club, and The Port of Kenosha. Take on 13 adrenaline-pumped levels of mayhem, confronting friends and foes alike. As you fight to the beat of lo-fi 8-bit renditions of Murder Generation's entire song catalogue, masterfully reimagined for the game, you'll navigate an array of adversaries and obstacles. Earn your place as a punk icon, staking your claim in the chaos of Cream City. 'Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos' blends the old-school arcade experience with a raw, punk aesthetic, delivering a gameplay experience as unforgettable as the anthems that soundtrack it.

content_descriptors.notes: 'Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos' caters to mature audiences, featuring content intrinsic to the authentic portrayal of the punk aesthetic. Violence, strong language, alcohol consumption, and veiled references to drug use are part of the game's narrative fabric, helping establish the atmosphere without resorting to gratuitous usage. Nonetheless, these elements may not suit all audiences, so player discretion is strongly advised.

detailed_description: Ride a wave of nostalgia into the heart of the Milwaukee punk scene with 'Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos'. In this arcade-style game reminiscent of the '80s and '90s, you'll journey with the band to iconic local venues like Last Rites, Cactus Club, and The Port of Kenosha. As you fight to the beat of lo-fi 8-bit renditions of Murder Generation's entire song catalogue, masterfully reimagined for the game, you'll navigate an array of adversaries and obstacles. Earn your place as a punk icon, staking your claim in the chaos of Cream City. 'Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos' blends the old-school arcade experience with a raw, punk aesthetic, delivering a gameplay experience as unforgettable as the anthems that soundtrack it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470, AMD FX-4350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460, AMD Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad use is strongly recommended. Designed to run in 4:3 aspect ratio ( 800x600 recommended).
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K, AMD FX-9590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 390X or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space

short_description: "Unleash your inner rebel in 'Murder Generation: Cream City Chaos', an 80s-90s arcade-style game set in Milwaukee's punk scene. Fight through 13 levels at iconic venues, aided by lo-fi 8-bit renditions of Murder Generation's music. Battle enemies, assist friends, and claim your punk icon status.
